about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting both heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Planar Monks
  • Planar Raiders
  • Orcs
  • Ettin
  • Efreeti
  • Earth Elemental
  • Cthulanite Wizard
  • Wight
  • Feyrealm Panther-beast

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting both heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.
